name: Slidey Letters
description:
Slidey Letters is a fun and family-friendly puzzle game!

The aim is to slide the tiles across the grid and merge matching tiles together in order to create higher-lettered tiles. Slidey Letters features two playing modes to suit players of any age or skill level: play for as long as you can in Classic Mode, or race the clock in Timed Mode! Earn points for every merge, and try to top your highest score!

GAMEPLAY

Slidey Letters is extremely easy to play: use the arrow keys to move the tiles across the board, and watch as the like-numbered tiles magically merge together. If you get stuck, you can restart the game at any time.

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screen within the game.

FEATURES

  • A fantastically fun, family-friendly puzzle game!
  • Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
  • Two challenging playing modes to master!
  • Simple, elegant game board design!
  • Bright and bubbly background tunes!
  • Suitable for players of all ages!
